DOC.brief_title: An Intergenerational Community Based Participatory Research ( CBPR ) Intervention Reduce Appalachian Health Disparities
DOC.detailed_description: The developmental phase project incorporate community base participatory research ( CBPR ) principles identify need preference community member regard energy balance . In intervention phase , group-randomized trial administers evaluate intergenerational , culturally appropriate energy balance intervention aim increase fruit vegetable intake increase physical activity among participant 6 distressed Appalachian county . Faith institution recruit randomized treatment wait-list control condition , participant recruit enrol within institution . Focusing Appalachian child , parent , grandparent , local lay health advisor deliver series group presentation , adapt We Can ! Media Smart Youth . In addition , project provide culturally consonant leave-behind `` booster '' activity , include square dance , cook class , community garden .
